data.message: How do you get this? I've gone through the website and there are no links to activate.  Thanks!

replies.message: Hi Brittany. There is no download. Once activated, if you are in the affected area, you will get a Facebook notification, see an alert at the top of your News Feed and receive an SMS from Facebook about Safety Check . Learn more about Safety Check here: https://www.facebook.com/about/safetycheck/. -Chantal
How do you activate?  There's nothing on the link you provided.  Thanks
Yeah, how do you activate it?
Same here, I want to activate this...
It will activate if you are in the area of a natural disaster. You don't do anything until that happens.
I've been trying to figure out how to activate this too. Pretty cool the way it works!
It's automatic. You don't need to do anything
This is actually a great idea!! Good job Facebook!!
Ok how do you activate????
Great idea!!
Carolyn see above comments; it's automatic and will activate if you are in the area of a natural disaster.

To activate it you just have to cause a disaster. Set your house on fire or something.

/s
Great idea FB!!! Gives me a sigh of relief to know that I can still get word to my family during a disaster...and visa versa! Thank you!
Awesome
Ok
Great.

Please read:  

From Facebook:
Hi Brittany. There is no download. Once activated, if you are in the affected area, you will get a Facebook notification, see an alert at the top of your News Feed and receive an SMS from Facebook about Safety Check . Learn more about Safety Check here: https://www.facebook.com/about/safetycheck/. -Chantal
Ok FB it has to be activated by us users but there is no way to do so!!!!! That is why you keep getting the questions!!!!!!!!!!
Once Facebook activates it, then it will active for all users that have the Facebook app. That's how I understood it.

If you want to activate this feature, simply cause an earthquake or other large scale disaster.

Also, thumbs up to Facebook for a great idea. Saves voice traffic for those who really need it.
Love this !!!!!
Think of it as 'built in' guys. If you have Facebook, you've got it. No activation needed. If you're in a disaster you'll experience the 'app' then ;-/
Great FB & Thankyou
I can't activate this.
